page.title: 21Cheadle to the D Road
page.content:
My late father and myself were drivers for Blue Circle and delivered face gravel from Huntley Wood quarry to the D road, along with sand and gravel as required. I remember they struck a coal seam which was close to the surface near to Talke and everything was suspended for a time as it could become inflammable and it had to be removed.

I have lived in Western Australia since 1978 and visited UK in 1998. I travelled down the D road one morning and thought, 'What a nice carpark I helped to build.'
Contribution by: Mr Michael Machin
